35  package fr.mcc.ginco.extjs.view.utils;
36  
37  import fr.mcc.ginco.beans.ThesaurusConcept;
38  import fr.mcc.ginco.exceptions.BusinessException;
39  import fr.mcc.ginco.extjs.view.enums.ThesaurusListNodeType;
40  import fr.mcc.ginco.extjs.view.node.IThesaurusListNode;
41  import fr.mcc.ginco.extjs.view.node.ThesaurusListBasicNode;
42  import fr.mcc.ginco.log.Log;
43  import fr.mcc.ginco.services.IThesaurusConceptService;
44  import org.slf4j.Logger;
45  import org.springframework.stereotype.Component;
46  
47  import javax.inject.Inject;
48  import javax.inject.Named;
49  import java.util.ArrayList;
50  import java.util.Collections;
51  import java.util.List;
52  
53  /**
54   * Generator in charge of building top term concepts
55   */
56  @Component(value = "topTermGenerator")
57  public class TopTermGenerator {
58  
59  	@Inject
60  	@Named("thesaurusConceptService")
61  	private IThesaurusConceptService thesaurusConceptService;
62  
63  	@Log
64  	private Logger logger;
65  
66  	/**
67  	 * Creates the list of top concepts for a given thesaurusId
68  	 * 
69  	 * @param thesaurusId
70  	 *            id of top node.
71  	 * @return created list of leafs.
72  	 */
73  	public List<IThesaurusListNode> generateTopTerm(String thesaurusId)
74  			throws BusinessException {
75  		logger.debug("Generating top term concepts list for thesaurusId : "
76  				+ thesaurusId);
77  		List<ThesaurusConcept> topTerms = thesaurusConceptService
78  				.getTopTermThesaurusConcepts(thesaurusId);
79  		logger.debug(topTerms.size() + " top terms found");
80  
81  		List<IThesaurusListNode> topConcepts = new ArrayList<IThesaurusListNode>();
82  		for (ThesaurusConcept topTerm : topTerms) {
83  			ThesaurusListBasicNode topTermNode = new ThesaurusListBasicNode();
84  			topTermNode.setTitle(thesaurusConceptService
85  					.getConceptLabel(topTerm.getIdentifier()));
86  			topTermNode
87                      .setId(ChildrenGenerator.ID_PREFIX
88                              + ChildrenGenerator.PARENT_SEPARATOR
89                              + topTerm.getIdentifier());
90  			topTermNode.setType(ThesaurusListNodeType.CONCEPT);
91              topTermNode.setThesaurusId(topTerm.getThesaurusId());
92              topTermNode.setDisplayable(true);
93              if(!thesaurusConceptService.hasChildren(topTerm.getIdentifier())) {
94                  topTermNode.setChildren(new ArrayList<IThesaurusListNode>());
95                  topTermNode.setLeaf(true);
96              } else {
97                  topTermNode.setChildren(null);
98                  topTermNode.setLeaf(false);
99              }
100 
101 			topConcepts.add(topTermNode);
102 		}
103 		Collections.sort(topConcepts);
104 		return topConcepts;
105 	}
106 }
